verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy Lord, most Holy Lord You alone are worthy of my praise. Holy Lord, most Holy Lord, With all of my heart I sing.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Great are You, Lord. Worthy of praise. Holy and true. Great are You, Lord. Most Holy Lord.{/lang-eng}
